metadata.title: CVE-2016-8611 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in Openstack Glance. No limits are enforcedwithin the Glance image service for both v1 and v2 `/images` API POSTmethod for authenticated users, resulting in possible denial of serviceattacks through database table saturation.

criterions.comment: glance: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
